items.title: Trump announces pause on tariffs for some Mexican goods
items.description: The move expanded a carve-out issued for automakers a day earlier.

items.title: WATCH:  Woman flies across country to surprise best friend who is 1st-time mom
items.description: Rachel Ritter and Mia Walters have been friends for more than 15 years!

items.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: CIA has begun firing newly hired employees
items.description: New hires at the CIA have begun getting laid off, the agency said Thursday.

items.title: Top Republicans and Democrats concerned about VA plan to cut 15% of its workforce
items.description: VA is preparing to lay off as many as 80,000 workers in coming weeks, according to an internal memo obtained by ABC News.

items.title: Screaming match breaks out in House after vote to censure Democrat Al Green
items.description: The House voted on Thursday to censure Democrat Al Green over his outburst at President Donald Trump's speech to Congress on Tuesday night.
